verbs.description: [V: ross] [ARG1: a williamson ross alexander williamson 27 of bolton ct and north truro] ma died saturday september 29 2018 at ballston beach on cape cod after being swept into the water by a heavy surf a perfect day for ross was walking ballston beach to newcomb hollow watching waves crashing as seagulls flew across blue sky punctuated with white puffy clouds piping plovers scampering along the sand pebbles rolling down the dunes and seals popping up to seemingly follow his travels that exactly the day he found last saturday ross attended bolton schools e o smith staar program holiday hill summer day camp and audited courses at university of connecticut for his high school community service project ross collected laundered and shipped over 6 000 beanie babies to us troops in iraq and afghanistan those beanie babies were shared with children as part of the humanitarian peace efforts his contribution was acknowledged by the national police transition team iraq the griffin team combat advisors bolton new york north truro ross alexander williamson seattle truro police ct griffin team afghanistan north truro massachusetts cape cod aikido of connecticut regional brigade advisory team truro ross a williamson newcomb hollow ross a williamson wa summers marlborough bolton schools red sox spokane iraq ballston beach ma national police transition team us pilgrim monument bolton e o smith uconn burton football complex
